}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *WPA3-Enterprise, WPA3-Personal, Wi-Fi Direct, WMM, Wi-Fi Agile Multiband :The full part of the ''[[MediaTek]]'' chip used in this device is '''MT7921LEN'''
:;[[MediaTek MT7921 Reference Design]] *FCC ID: [https://electric.garden/RAS-MT7921 RAS-MT7921] (09/25/2020) :[[MediaTek MT7921 Reference Design|MediaTek MT7921]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7921LEN *{{WiFiCert|WFA100148|11/05/2020}} :[https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=16519 WFA100148] (2020-11-05)
